website_summaries.verdict: Mixture of dry cat food with freeze-dried bites that allows you to save a bit versus a bag of only freeze-dried food.
pros: Contains 38% protein to deliver a higher concentration of protein than other dry cat foods
Uses only high-quality protein sources for the freeze-dried bits
Cats will like having different textures in the cat food
cons: Contains ingredients other than the freeze-dried protein
May draw insects if not sealed properly

customer_reviews.title: Cat Approved
customer_reviews.text: I have 8 cat's and all owners know how finicky they can be when it comes to eating. All 8 have given this a 5 star rating. As an owner, I'm more concerned with health. This exceeds my standards and is moderately priced.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sue Roe

customer_reviews.title: Dinner Winner
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food my little old lady cat will eat, and that’s a very good thing. My issue is with the way it’s packaged. Only available in 3 oz cans, packaged in 12 cans at most. At two cans a day (3 ounces is a small single serving) 12 cans don't last a week - except as empties in the recycling bin. I’d really like to see a larger can/less expensive per ounce option, but for now, I’m just glad I found something my cat really loves.
customer_reviews.author: PunPal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling to find my elderly cat a dry food he will eat - after several months of losing weight and no apparent reason found in blood work, my vet and I decided that he probably has lost a some of his sense of smell, so nothing was stimulating his appetite. He also has been a habitual vomiter all his life. From the first moment I put some of this dry food in his bowl he has chowed it down. Two months later, I realize he no longer vomits, he has put on some weight, his coat looks wonderful, and he no longer wants anything to do with wet cat food! Thank you Purina!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this
customer_reviews.text: They absolutely love this brand and particular flavor. They also haven't thrown up since I switched to this, and while I can't scientifically say it's because this food agrees with their tummies more.... I'd say it agrees with their tummies more.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES this
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write a ton of Amazon reviews but I definitely need to write one for this. My kitten is now transitioning into adult food and while I have him on blue for his wet food I wanted something I could get at the store easily for dry food. This seems like a decent one for a lower end brand. My cat is not super into food so I am able to leave dry food out all day and he just kind of nipples as he pleases. Well I woke up this morning and he had broke into my cabinet and done this to the bag. So it’s safe to say this gets an A+ from Louis
customer_reviews.author: Elshy

customer_reviews.title: Cat food....
customer_reviews.text: I just got the cat food & gave my cat a small dish of it & she seems to like it, so that's a good thing. I cannot give her cheap cat food with by products & other unknown things in it as she has an allergy & gets scabs around her neck & at the base of her tail, so I'm assuming this cat food will be good for her. If it works well for her, I will be reordering it as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa Morris

customer_reviews.title: Picky eaters loved it
customer_reviews.text: Trying to switch my picky boys to a wet-food diet. Haven't thrown up since I switched the food. Very noticeable change in their coat health as well. So soft 😍
customer_reviews.author: Lvf2156

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this dry food.
customer_reviews.text: This is their favorite. I keep 3 different types of dry food out at all times plus feed wet food. I have a feral cat that prefers one of the others. My older cats prefers this dry food. My other just have a buffet depending on what they feel like eating.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My finicky kitty loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats has allergies & asthma, and the vet said I need to make sure his diet is grain-free. Unfortunately, he’s also a very picky eater (unlike my other cat, who’ll eat pretty much anything). I don’t know how many different brands and flavors he’s turned up his nose at! Finally, I found something he will eat! Hallelujah!
customer_reviews.author: lolita

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My cat was recently diagnosed with diabetes and I had to find a high protein, low carb food for him. He is a very picky eater and would not eat what I got from the vet. It was pork flavored and he just didn't like it no matter how much I mixed in little bits of his old food to try to tempt him. I got this Purina Beyond WILD and he gobbles it down. I only give him a small spoonful at a time, as it is rather expensive. That is the only thing I would change about it if I could, but I realize you have to pay more to get better quality food.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J. Short

customer_reviews.title: Occasional treat.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pate I have seen my picky cat eat with enthusiasm. I give it to her as an occasional treat when I think she may want a change from her beloved Fancy Feast Medleys mostly poultry varieties which are by far her favorites. The ingredients are about as wholesome as you can get, and the phosphorous levels are relatively low. She eats this well, but only on occasion - maybe because it is so dense and rich. Cannot find these in any brick-and-mortar pet or grocery store around me.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Price increase!!
customer_reviews.text: Both my picky cat and my easy going kitten are loving it. They go for the chunks but enjoy it all. My problem is that I ordered a 5 lb. Bag for 12, 13 dollars. Went back to order more and it's up to 21 dollars for a 5lb bag! Ridiculous!!
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have some picky cats and one with tummy troubles. When we switched to grain-free cat foods, the tummy troubles went way down for that one. Not only is this a healthy grain-free cat food, but all four of our cats LOVE this flavor! This is definitely one brand/flavor of cat food we can't do without!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Feets loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, my cat’s name is Feets. He loves this stuff no matter which flavor I get him. We feed him the Beyond Wild turkey and lentil dry food. I use this to get more hydration into his system as cats just don’t drink enough water. I add some chicken broth to it so it mixes with the juice in the can and first he drinks the juice then he grazes on the pate for the next few hours. He loves it and it has helped him be more hydrated. 1/2 a can every other day. It’s tasty, it’s good for him and if he’s happy, I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: NmTrekker

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this food!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this food - cats love it! It is mostly meat, which is what cats should eat, and has no fillers. I will keep buying this food!
customer_reviews.author: Paula B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It smells like real food!
customer_reviews.text: It's very strange to open a ton of cat food and it actually smells like food!😁 But, that's exactly why this stuff is so good. My 5 pound, 13 year old cat (she was the runt, I think) pulled a Houdini and escaped for an entire week. When she showed up, she was in good shape except a bit of weight loss and the vet suggested this to help her gain the weight back. One 12 pack later and she's back to fighting weight...And still trying to be an escape artist.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Thornback

customer_reviews.title: Cat ate it,  did not regurgitate
customer_reviews.text: Cat ate it, did not regurgitate. Small can, I did not read the ounces before ordering, but I am not actually complaining. Texture was good. Arrived promptly. I liked it by observance (I didn't taste it :-) ) more-so than the saucy or shred style Friskies. Cat does not like the shred style eithe.
customer_reviews.author: noah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for health- amazing shiny coats!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pomeranian who eats dry food with Raw bites added. When we added a kitten to the family- I noticed the kitten eating the raw bites over everything else. This cat went from being the runt to having one of the glossiest, most beautiful coats I've ever seen. (He is also very healthy!) Neither one sheds. The cat is a medium hair. Each gets food with raw bites and both seem much healthier for it. I do have to watch them though, this food is their favorite and both the cat and dog just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Go Plants

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats will eat dry food 9-Lives and Meow Mix in seafood flavor, great stand by. But for wet food they are the finickiest, but this one they all love. I had tried many brands, which I had to return, but this one they all love. I recommend it. Like I said if all of my five cats like it, it must be good, no it is GOOD and the ingredients are better than other store brands.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Humeniuk

customer_reviews.title: My cats didn't touch it but we all know how cats are.
customer_reviews.text: Certain cats only like certain kinds of food. This was trial and error for us and they didn't even touch this food. Not even one bit. Which of course doesn't mean this food is bad. Thus the 4-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: The Greek Owl Girl

customer_reviews.title: FREEZE DRIED CHUNKS ARE HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves Beyond dry food so I was shocked when my order with the freeze dried chunks was rejected by the cat. Those chunks are ineible and indestructable. I gathered about 20 freeze dried chunks and put them in water for over a week to observe them. By the 10th day, none of them had dissolved and they were barely soft. Do NOT buy this for your cat if you value their life!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Dow

customer_reviews.title: The hype is true
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are true. I was skeptical about giving my Bengal cat an $8 bag of food, kind of makes me feel like putting 87 gas in a Ferrari, but he likes it more than his wet food. He is the pickiest eater ever and even the most expensive brands he won’t eat. But for some reason he can’t get enough of this food. He doesn’t even like turkey, he’s a fish eater but this is his favorite cat food for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent food. highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My cats fell in love with this food. They actually fight over it when I put it out for them . My 4 cats are alot healthier bc of this product. Especially my 15 yr old who we almost lost to kidney failure. This food has really helped her bounce back.
customer_reviews.author: LORI SEARS

customer_reviews.title: Wild Turkey
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it, I change over to fish and poultry occasionaly just to keep them from getting bored with food. But all in all I like Beyond food. Also like getting it from Amazon as sometimes had a real problem getting it in the stre and their service is great usually get it in 2 days
customer_reviews.author: Barb917

customer_reviews.title: One of my cats liked it
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats liked it, but the picky one tended to only eat the kibble and leave the chicken. I'm not surprised, though, because he's so picky he won't eat any kind of fresh fish, like tuna! I've tried fresh chicken tenders and fresh liver. He hates it all. Must have been a privileged prince in a former life!
customer_reviews.author: PurrCat

customer_reviews.title: My picky cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is super picky. She loved Beyond's quail but I can't find it anywhere. Knowing she loves liver and quail (turkey can be a deal breaker) I thought I would try the 12 pack and donate it if she turned her nose pop and walked away at the first can. She loves it!! It's like that old Life cereal commercial.
customer_reviews.author: Senorita

customer_reviews.title: Good taste but makes them puke a lot.
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved the flavor and the little chicken pieces. The size of the kibble was good and it wasn't too hard for them to chew. The only thing I don't like is that my cats can't digest it very well. They both puke it back up within 20 min of eating it. I have tried this for 3 months and I followed the recommended regimen for changing their food. I'm going to have to go back to buying Purina Beyond indoor formula. They ate that just fine for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Enbear3

customer_reviews.title: Senior Timmy's New Favorite Dry Food
customer_reviews.text: Tried a couple of new grain free dry foods due to health concerns. This is our guy's new favorite grazing food. We keep a dish stocked all day and feed grain free high protein canned pate a couple of times a day in addition. His weight had dropped alarmingly low and since the feeding regimen change he's actually added a couple of pounds, has stopped overgrooming, and has visibly more energy. We're a happy family again.
customer_reviews.author: OmaDeb

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I have four cats. My one cat loved these treats so much that he would steal them out of my snack basket, carry the package upstairs, and rip into it with the assistance of the other three cats. He did this twice, so now I had to put the treats in a plastic container. These treats must be extra good - and my cats are pretty finicky, especially when it comes to treats!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My picky cat loves this! She's toothless so we have to do pates. Wish it came in a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Cat gobbles it down
customer_reviews.text: Ipick a can, my 18 year old can gets to her hind legs batting at me to hurry. I do add just a bit of water for her and breakfast is served. (also lunch and dinner. ) Cat is very happy with this Beyond... in any flavor but fish. She has never like fish in any way but fresh cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great food, great deal
customer_reviews.text: Me and my cat's absolutely love this cat food, I love it because it's made with good ingredients, they love it because it tastes good. Normally I spend about $21 per 5 lb bag at our local grocery stores, so this was an amazing deal, will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Decent protein cat kibble without a bunch of grain
customer_reviews.text: Seems like decent cat food, better than most. My cat refuses to eat the pure kibbles that are healthier than silly flavor and shaped kibbles. But I offered her bits of this food like treats and now she likes it. She searches thru the bowl looking for the dried meat chunks, like a kid picking out the marshmallows in lucky charms cereal. So far, she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: We keep buying it because our cats like it and seem to thriving eating it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but my cats eat all of it except the crumbs. Repeat buyer. Our cats don't have vomiting issues eating it. Actually I think they have less of a hairball issue with it but the evidence is anecdotal. Our cats appear to thrive on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan K

customer_reviews.title: some cans were spoiled
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of bad cans in my order. We used a couple of cans and had no problem at first. But a couple cans in I had two cats become sick. The next can opened smelled really bad. Not just like a cat food regular smell but "food spoiled". Canceled my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old cat is picky and he actually loves this!! He was getting really thin and he actually lost 2 pounds so I ordered this food. Even my neighbor said he has put on a little weight and looks much better!! He is an indoor/ outdoor cat and he is 14... I put this food on autoship now! 4 stars because it’s pricey... but it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamielee Prochot

customer_reviews.title: My Bengal Loves It !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bengal Cat she always ate Merrick morsel wet food. All of a sudden she stop eating it. I try this base on the reviews I have gone through 100's of dollars trying to find a food she likes. I just started trying Purina cat food also Purina Mussel Masterpieces she loves that also . She gobbled both products right up. Thank you Purina
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My only problem with this cat food is it is so expensive. I cannot afford to buy it all the time, even though my vet recommended high protein, no grain food for my cat. I have had to intersperse it with the food I had been purchasing and hope that would be good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J. Short

customer_reviews.title: good for cats with food allergies
customer_reviews.text: Our orange tabby is sensitive to foods, and this is one of the few dry foods we have found that he can eat without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Quality Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This food literally saved my cat's life. She has regained the weight she lost, she is a 16 years old Ragdoll. Many cat foods have added fillers and ingredients that over time will cause medical conditions that shorten the life of a cat, this one doesn't contain any of those ingredients. Do your research.
customer_reviews.author: Mowone

customer_reviews.title: ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: wont buy again of course the cats thought it was great when tasting something new .....now not so much its ok i feed all the wild animals the food my cats wont or i give it to my friend who runs a cat rescue
customer_reviews.author: Jean G

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic food.
customer_reviews.text: My cats is a rescue ragdoll breed. When I first had him he would have eaten anything then I gave him a bowl of this food and now he's willing to go hungry rather than eat anything but this. His entire appearance after three months is entirely different. Especially his fur. I'm on a very limited income but it is worth it to do without a few things in order to buy this particular food for him..
customer_reviews.author: Joy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purina Product!
customer_reviews.text: My cats both love this line of wet food! I've always had good luck with Purina and my fur babies. But they seem to LOVE this one, second only to the seafood stew Pro Plan.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recycle.
customer_reviews.text: Not enough sauce/liquid for kitty's taste. I add boxed vegetable broth to make it palatable. And, cans are so small and cannot recycle because of white, cancer causing can lining. Recycler will not accept.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Best dry I can find
customer_reviews.text: So far the best dry I can find. Dry food is not good for pets but I put a little out at night so he won’t wake me up early. No grain or by-products is what I wanted. Kitty gets sick of it pretty quick but he’s easily bored
customer_reviews.author: Judie Fizer

customer_reviews.title: Cats loved it
customer_reviews.text: All three cats loved it. Just wish it was less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jani Doyle

customer_reviews.title: My cat went crazy for this!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is so picky & he never eats a small can of food. I have this to him today, about 1/2 the can, and he acted like he was starving! He licked every bit and wanted more. He ate the entire can! Am definitely ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: David Clem/Wanda Swartling

customer_reviews.title: $pendy. Cats didn't like it (even the one that eats everything)
customer_reviews.text: Mojito and Chicken weren't feeling this stuff. Nuff said. So far the Salmon/sweet potato and Ocean whitefish/egg combos have been the most well received. They all smell like death but at least it's not as bad as wet food *shiver*...
customer_reviews.author: Ivy S

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves Beyond Wild Grain Free wet food so much, I bought the dry food to pair with it! She's doing well on both--her coat looks great and her mood is good. Highly recommended even for fussy eaters like my girl.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Wholesome ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about what I feed my cat. This food meets my quality requirements. She likes it and her shedding is reduced since being on it. At first she wouldn't eat the freeze dried bits but now she picks them out first. She also eats Beyond wet food.
customer_reviews.author: rcpmom

customer_reviews.title: she loves it !
customer_reviews.text: all i know is puddy likes this brand. with her its all black or white.likes it,doesnt like it. with my dogs every meal seems to be their last meal....
customer_reviews.author: geofleet

customer_reviews.title: They ate it!
customer_reviews.text: My kitties liked it! And they are eating it all daily! One is allergic to grain products; this fits her just fine! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn T. Roper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t make her itch! Finally!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is allergic to grain and fish. Even though fish oil shouldn’t make her pull out her fur, it does. It’s very difficult to find good tasting cat food without any fish products. This is the first food we’ve found in a long time that doesn’t make her pull her fur out and she loves the taste. I love that it has ingredients that cats should actually eat. Highly recommended! Thank you Purina!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Cats Hate It but Love the other Flavors
customer_reviews.text: We've tried many other Purina Beyond flavors and the cats love it. This stuff, not so much. They want to line the litter box with it. That's about where the money went.
customer_reviews.author: MeowCat

customer_reviews.title: good for allergic cats
customer_reviews.text: Both of our tabbies are sensitive regarding food, and this is one of the few brands we've found that won't cause them to throw up or get gunk in their ears.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: got the order today. came fast and the cat loves his food. thank, my cat happy, I m happy
customer_reviews.author: Dennis  Salaiz

customer_reviews.title: The cat eats it
customer_reviews.text: He is finicky and he will eat this daily so I keep buying it! Smells pretty rough however. I guess it is cat food. What can i say.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha from Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Cats don't like
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my cats don't care for this food. But I have to admit that they are picky eaters, especially since I don't make them use their allowance to pay for food.
customer_reviews.author: pam d.

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: Can’t rate flavor myself I’m just rating by what Kitty says. She can’t get enough of it! I will emit it smells pretty good! Price is pretty high
customer_reviews.author: pat t.

customer_reviews.title: Loves this Purina food too.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the salmon flavor, but I wanted to give him a variety, so I bought this and thankfully he loves this too. Thank you Purina.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Cats love the chicken bits.
customer_reviews.text: I love the chicken, It's a nice treat for my cats and they love it. It's WAY TOO EXPENSIVE. So, I just buy a bag every other month or so and lightly mix it with their normal food. Cool stuff. Both cats eat it and ones an extremely picky eater.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good Healthy Quality and Delivers on Time
customer_reviews.text: Got the food delivered a day after ordering it and the cat loves them already. The quality should be really good and healthy for our cat.
customer_reviews.author: EST. LEE DISPLAY L D 1902

customer_reviews.title: one carton defective  (6 cartoons sent
customer_reviews.text: Carton seemed to be wet internally - one can had lost its vacuum - others in box seemed fine after extensive cleaning of all cans. Other 5 cartons not affected.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Tolerable?
customer_reviews.text: My ferals eat it..barely. My own two cats, barely. Probably not the product itself..just not much liked by my cats but they DO eat it if I mix it with Friskies pate.
customer_reviews.author: Karmic Grace

customer_reviews.title: Cat lives it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food . No allergy problems so far. He’s been eating it for a couple of months. The value is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Casey

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this one
customer_reviews.text: I use this a treat for my cat between meals. Just a few morsels and she is happy- she loves the dried chicken pieces
customer_reviews.author: L. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat!
customer_reviews.text: My cat sometimes seems to enjoy this canned cat food and some days not. I suppose it depends on the day, since he’s picky. I try to select food that is higher quality and this seems to be.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Shiny coats and glowing eyes
customer_reviews.text: Since switching to Beyond Dry Cat Food, we have noticed a difference in energy levels, shinier, thicker coats, and glowing eyes. They love the flavor as the food disappears in the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth Paying a Little Extra
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old cat, Flo, is getting finicky. Bought this for her: she dug in like she’s never had food. Therefore, I assume it tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Frugal

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: ONLY PROBLEM, YOU NEED ALTERNATE WITH 3-4 OTHER FLAVORS, OTHERWISE CAT IS BORED WITH SAME THING AT MEALTIME.
customer_reviews.author: K. Darby

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I initially was sent a bag of this as a sample, as my cats usually eat the Beyond cat food. This Wild line is amazing! My cats love it (especially the freeze dried pieces!)
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Cost more but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Yes they do cost more, quite a lot, however my 2 cats love it , no more throw ups. Great ingredients mostly natural!
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Fairhurst

customer_reviews.title: kitties like it, & I like the higher protein content
customer_reviews.text: My SPOILED kitties like this, so I use it for a treat, or topper for their always available bowl of kibble
customer_reviews.author: Georgia L. Holland

customer_reviews.title: My cats refused to eat the food
customer_reviews.text: Odor of the cat food had a little bit of a chemical process smell instead of an all animal food smell. My cats refused to finish the first can, and stayed away from their food dish the next meal time.
customer_reviews.author: lorrie

customer_reviews.title: TOO BAD IT'S BEEN OUT OF STOCK FOR A WHILE
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved this food, but it's been out of stock for a while and I am looking for another food.
customer_reviews.author: J.J. KAUFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Our rescue loves this food. Great quality for the price. Won't buy any other than the Purina Beyond flavors.
customer_reviews.author: mamesh

customer_reviews.title: Boots and Cinder love it
customer_reviews.text: Boots and Cinder can’t wait for their 600pm feeding! It’s the highlight of their day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitty approved!
customer_reviews.text: Ocho Maya is a finicky little boy, but he definitely enjoys this food.
customer_reviews.author: ALS

customer_reviews.title: Bengal is obsessed.
customer_reviews.text: My Bengal devours this. I love that Purina came out with a wild line that has a lot of protein rather than just fillings.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved this food. It is a great price for the amount of cans you get. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Burr

customer_reviews.title: Dry, an appetizing texture. Cats would not eat it.
customer_reviews.text: Neither of my two feral cats would eat this. It appeared very dry and unappetizing.
customer_reviews.author: Ned and Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves this food. The small turkey bits are the first th in ng she eats, but then she finishes the food every day. Need more flavors of the "wild" for cats.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great hedgehog food
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog loves this food. I wish they would bring back the smaller pieces though.
customer_reviews.author: Anytime Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cat food
customer_reviews.text: Little freeze dried bits were a nice healthy treat for my Cat
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Tellez

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Cats eat, but the youngest is mildly allergic. Switching back to the regular chicken Beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie Basney

customer_reviews.title: Good cat food
customer_reviews.text: Received them quickly. All my cats really like these "wild" cat foods. Wish they were cheaper.

customer_reviews.title: My cats really like this stuff...

customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this food and so does their vet.

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it, and the ingredients list is good. I'm satisfied, and will continue to buy it.

customer_reviews.title: Good cat food.
customer_reviews.text: The cats ate it but like the other kinds flavor better. It doesn’t smell to bad. (Some cat food stinks)

customer_reviews.text: My cat is a picky eater and there’s nothing more disappointing than when he turns his nose up at premium food. Luckily this one’s a hit!

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our fussy cranky kitten loves it. She literally ignores me and sticks her whole head in her food dish purring. She doesn’t care that I exist because she loves this food so much!

customer_reviews.title: No grains...no artificial ingredients...crafted in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's healthy for my cats and that they like it :-)

customer_reviews.title: Cans dented, ordered twice. Food itself is good.
customer_reviews.text: At least half the cans were dented. A new order sent out and the same thing. This is unacceptable.

product_meta.title: Purina Beyond Wild Grain Free, Natural, High Protein Adult Cat Food
product_meta.description: Style:Dry Food| Flavor Name:Turkey & Lentil| Size:5 lb. BagGive your cat the energy to live wild when you fill her dish with Purina Beyond WILD Turkey & Lentil Recipe + Freeze-Dried Bites With Chicken dry cat food. This recipe is the first offering by Purina to incorporate freeze-dried sources of high-quality protein, giving your cat recognizable ingredients you can see in every serving. Real U.S. farm-raised turkey is the #1 ingredient in this premium dry cat food, so you can feel good about what goes into the meals you serve her every day. This nutrient-dense formula features 38% protein to help maintain her lean muscles, so she can keep up her playful and active lifestyle. Made with no artificial colors, flavors or preservatives, and with no poultry by-product meal, this grain-free dry cat food offers a tempting mealtime option you can both appreciate. Getting your cat the nutritious food she needs is as easy as placing an order for Purina Beyond WILD Turkey & Lentil Recipe + Freeze-Dried Bites With Chicken dry cat food on Amazon.com.
feature_bullets: Made With U.S. Farm-Raised Turkey + Freeze-Dried Bites With Chicken
38% Protein To Help Maintain Lean Muscle
Nutrient-Dense Formula To Give Your Cat Energy To Live Wild
5 Lb. Bag - Purina Beyond Wild Turkey & Lentil Recipe + Freeze-Dried Bites With Chicken Adult Dry Cat Food
